title: All the Naruto from 1-633 Ereader Ready
description:
OK, third time lucky, I hope.

Massive apologies - I'm newish to uploading and messed up this torrent not once but TWICE. This is the one that works. I promise!!!

I wanted to read all the Naruto manga on my ereader but the only format available online was individual jpeg files. Reading them as individual jpegs is a royal pain in the ass IMO so I felt I needed to do something about it.

So what I have done here is convert all the chapters from individual jpegs into pdfs. I did not do the original work of translating or scanning, just converted them. Some of the pages that were two-page spreads in the manga are sideways to the rest of the document because of the way they were originally scanned. I did not have time to fix each individual sideways page due to time constraints. 

If you would like to take the time to rotate the sideways pages yourself, I can highly recommend PDFill to do pages individually. It is a free program that allows you to edit PDFs in many different ways. Powerful and useful: http://www.pdfill.com/

Naruto chapters from 1 to 633 are included in this torrent. Please reseed and enjoy!
